ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Making platinum?
ygData.msgSnippet: Collect items used in tradeskills and sell them in the bazaar. worked for my mother. luv, -Su ... books ... them
ygData.messageBody:
Collect items used in tradeskills and sell them in the bazaar. worked for my
mother.
luv,
-Su

> Hi, everyone.
>
> I've only been playing EQ a few months, and I have a ranger on Tarew Marr
> who has just made 12th level and a warrior who's at 3rd level. I keep
> looking for strategies for each character all over the Web, but one thing
> eludes me. Of course, that's making platinum. I keep seeing all these
books
> for sale on how to make platinum easily and quickly, but I keep writing
them
> off as scams. Are there any half-decent methods for growing wealthier?
>
> Chris
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com

>
